gamedemo package¶

Submodules¶

gamedemo.climbers module¶

climbers.py¶

This module contains the Climber class that represents game characters.

class gamedemo.climbers.Climber(name, weapon)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Climber class represents the climber in the game. :ivar health: The current health of the climber. Statrts at 100. Once the health reaches 0 the climber falls off the route.

property is_alive¶

True if :attr: ‘health’ is larger than 0, False otherwise

take_hit(damage)[source]¶

This method gets called when the Climber takes a hit from Route. :param damage: The damage the climber takes. This will be subtracted from :attr:’health’. :return: The new value of :attr: health

class gamedemo.climbers.Route(name, weapon)[source]¶

Bases: object

The Route class represents the route the climber is trying to climb

take_hit(damage)[source]¶
property unsent¶

True if :attr: ‘health’ is larger than 0, False otherwise

gamedemo.game module¶

gamedemo.skills module¶

skills.py¶

This module contains classes for Skills.

class gamedemo.skills.Attempt[source]¶

Bases: Skills

This class is the subclass of :class: ‘Skills’ It represents the hold type the climber will implement to get through the route.

redpoint_attempt()[source]¶

This method should return a tuple (damage, text) : how much damage was dealt to the climber and what text to ouput. Text is a format string with placeholders for the climber.

class gamedemo.skills.Flow[source]¶

Bases: Skills

Flow is only used by RockClimbingWizards or RockClimbingMuses. It can deal alot of damage, but has its drawbacks. There is a 30% chance that flow attempt will not work, and after a successful flow attempt you will need to wait a while before you will be able to access Flow again.

attack()[source]¶
class gamedemo.skills.Skills[source]¶

Bases: ABC

This abstract class defines the method :meth: ‘tryhard’ that should be implemented by subclasses.

abstract redpoint_attempt(other)[source]¶

This method should return a tuple (damage, text) : how much damage was dealt to the climber and what text to ouput. Text is a format string with placeholders for the climber.

Module contents¶

Red River Gorge : Rock Climbing¶

This was adapted from a pluralsight tutorial < ‘https://app.pluralsight.com/library/courses/python-best-practices-code-quality/table-of-contents’ >

The idea is to simulate a very simple role-playing game where a climber is working on climbing a route.

The game mechanics are controlled by the game.Game class.

The climbers are controlled by the Climber instances.

Each of which has a Skill to use to send a rock climb.

The scenario will be rock climbing. where a climber and belayer are trying to SEND a rock climb together.

rrg_climbing_game
